content:
I've edited the statement:

Goal
* Changed "char" to "character(s)".

* Changed "contain" to "contains".

* Changed "direction" to "directions".

Input
* Fixed the typos: Ligne => Line.

* Changed "direction" to "directions".

* Formatted "right" and "left" as constants.

* Changed 'in a string format like "right;left;left"' to "separated by {{;}}".

* Changed "Ligne 3 - S : Line S of" to "Next S lines: A line of".
too similar to some existing CoC and puzzles

The tasks looks familiar:

Rotate 90 degree: https://www.codingame.com/contribute/view/790e1e25f7d104e1529ff8411f3907f3e71
Rotate 45 degree: https://www.codingame.com/contribute/view/1637c5b4e27a686d94208958467e2d796e6e
Rotate multiple times and apply gravity: https://www.codingame.com/contribute/view/470ee2d6180bd41469770d13396894d8b61
Transpose: https://www.codingame.com/contribute/view/99136d166bf7bf0bcc5101a0610c2f72c4c
I would say it's not bad, but knowing that many complain about the difficulty ... I'll say it's too easy

Yes i think it's too easy too. How can i make it more harder ?
I can make a system with "right" or "left" rotation and number of multiple rotation. Do you think it's good idea ?

It would be nice if you also received an entry indicating the number of degrees that you turn
ex:
90 right
180 down

Yes but only 4 side then 4 degree.
(0-360) 90 180 270 but it can be good for the 'number of multiple rotation' system i said

yes, you could create an input string with its instructions
ex:
left;right;left = left
right;right = down

You mean this?
